#this file is the text version of the binary file with comments
#you need to be clear that only 0 and 1 will appear in the binary file
00000000000000000000000000001111	#15, the length of the file ,without first 2 lines;
00000000000000000000001000001100	#0x0000020C, the start address of the instruction
00000000000000000000000000000010	
00000000000000000000000000000001
00000000000000000000000000000010	#data segment
00001000100000000000001000000000	#start of instruction, addi $4,$0,0x0200
00001100011001000000000000000000	
00000100010000110000000000000000
00001000001001000000000000000100
11111100000000000000000000000010
00001100101001000000000000000100
00001100110001000000000000001000
00010100101001100000000000000000
00010000101001000000000000000100
00010000110001000000000000001000
11111100000000000000000000000010
11111100000000000000000000000001	#end of instruction
